results.title: Billabong
results.brief_description: Set among the red gums, this film captures the mood of one day on the Murray River, Echuca, Victoria. Shows where thousands of birds come to breed each year.

results.title: Five fit fellows
results.brief_description: Gymnastic youngsters bound through a regime of physical health and fitness. An instructional film promoting an ideal of rigorous physical culture demonstrating a number of acrobatic manouvers.

results.title: A Real man's job: Images of Australian women in wartime [kit]
results.creator_credit: History Teacher's Association of Victoria, Australian War Memorial, ImMEDIAte Action and Felicity Cockram
results.brief_description: Subtitled Images of Australian women in wartime this kit aims to identify the real contribution that women made during both world wars and also at the images of women in wartime that were projected. Authored by Tim Gurry, Robert Lewis and Richard Reid, the kit draws together a wide variety of material with suggestions for its use, into nine Evidence Files, a videocassette and Teacher’s notes.
results.title_for_label: A Real man’s job: Images of Australian women in wartime [kit]
results.creator_credit_for_label: History Teacher’s Association of Victoria, Australian War Memorial, ImMEDIAte Action and Felicity Cockram

results.title: BYO
results.creator_credit: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
results.brief_description: A dramatised film of a school dance where the smuggling in of alcohol causes more trouble than it is worth. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: BYO: sprung
results.creator_credit: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
results.brief_description: One in a series of films following BYO, this episode revolves around the attitudes of the parents whose teenage son comes home drunk. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: BYO: spiked
results.creator_credit: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
results.brief_description: One of a series of films following BYO. In this episode the attempts of some parents to allow moderate drinking at a party are thwarted by gatecrashers. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: Experiments in three colour separation
results.brief_description: A documentary of the work of Arthur and Corinne Cantrill since 1975 in 3-colour separation. Discusses the classic theories and principles in 3-colour separation in film and photography. Commentary by Arthur Cantrill.
